title: Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather      All Seasons The altitude is 8,500 feet above sea level, so pace yourself in any season, drink a lot of water, and use sunscreen.        Visitors at the Big Stump NPS Photo  Summer Summers are generally of short duration with pleasant warm days and cool nights. Summer thunderstorms with lightning and hail occur almost daily. Typically they begin mid-day and last through the afternoon. The safest places are within buildings or your automobiles. Freezing temperatures can sometimes occur during summer months.         Hornbek Homestead on a winter day NPS Photo   Winter Sub-zero lows can occur in the winter. Dress in warm layers to keep dry and to prevent hypothermia.
